column5: Hey guys i need someone who know their stuff(or not)  about steeelhead fishing im a 14 yr old mature fisherman that has been fishing for 5 yrs and caught his first fish( brookie) before he could walk. i need some one  that is serious about steelhead float of fly that can meet me in the first am hours(3-8) in the morning at my place in brampton. right on a nice stretch of the credit river and do some fishing together .this is my second year steelheading (float and fly ) and i NEED  some more experience pls you can PM me or post in the thread have a great night!!!
